title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new pdf emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it does not take effect in the new pdf emitter.
EB: The display property set to 'none' should hide the item in the new pdf emitter.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the new pdf emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Check if the item is hidden in the pdf emitter.
